project_abstract.cdata: This Community Development Project seeks to improve the availability and quality of economic and social infrastructure services in small municipalities and villages in the West Bank and Gaza (WBG).  The project consists of 3 main components.  The civil works component deals with the implementation of at least 250 infrastructure microprojects.  The project management component will handle supplemental operating costs, vehicles, communications and other equipment, training and impact studies needed for project execution and management.  The institution building component will encompass subcontract agreements to provide training.
